description:
Cinnamon is desperate to go for a walk, but it’s raining again. Lucky finds a new, questionable hobby.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amaoto wa Ikusa no Shirabe: Hajimari wa Itsumo Ame
Rain Is the Melody of War: It Always Starts with Rain
المطر هو لحن الحرب ~ دامًا ما يكون المطر هو البداية ~
雨音は戦の調べ~始まりはいつも雨~
